page.title: 09INSIDE ALL SAINTS CHURCH
page.content: {The Font}is Norman,and is interlaced with round arches.{The "Leper" Window is a small window in the wall near the main door.It is directly above the font.If you look through the window and through another window in the Chancel wall and to the Altar.{The {Chandelier}was given to the church by Mayor Mr.C.Pratt in 1871.{The Pulpit {Sand-timer}lasts 20 minutes.{The {Chancel}leans,because Jesus's head leans to one side.{The Altar}is carved wood.{The Old Chest}is 16th century & has a complicated lock.{The Luddington {Tombs}in the south are the oldest graves in the church.{The Stained {Glass}is all Victorian.{The List of {Vicars}is on the wall behind the notice board by the door.The wall has some gravestones in it because after a fire there were no available stones. { }
